## DCA Tutorial

### Select a language

Example code is available in four languages.

```{r, echo = FALSE}
tibble::tibble(
  r = list(gt::html('<a href="dca-tutorial-r.html"><img src="images/r-icon.png" width="620" /></a>')),
  stata = list(gt::html('<a href="dca-tutorial-stata.html"><img src="images/stata-icon.png" width="90" /></a>')),
  sas = list(gt::html('<a href="dca-tutorial-sas.html"><img src="images/sas-icon.png" width="65" /></a>')),
  python = list(gt::html('<a href="dca-tutorial-python.html"><img src="images/python-icon.png" width="95" /></a>')),
) |>
  gt::gt() |>
  gt::cols_label(r = gt::md("**R**"),
                 stata = gt::md("**Stata**"),
                 sas = gt::md("**SAS**"),
                 python = gt::md("**Python**")) |>
  gt::cols_width(everything() ~ gt::px(150)) |>
  gt::opt_table_lines("none")
```
